entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
